      • sendFriendRequest

        public boolean sendFriendRequest(android.content.Context context,
                                 java.lang.String myUsername,
                                 java.lang.String friendUsername)
        Saves the received requests list of the desired friend
        Parameters:
        context - The Application Context at the time of calling. Use getApplicationContext()
        myUsername - String username of the current user
        friendUsername - String username of the friend we're trying to follow
        Returns:
        boolean true if other user found; false if friend not found.

        myUsername - String username of the current user
        friendUsername - String username of the friend trying to follow me

        boolean true if other user found; false if not found.
